input_text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to turn off bold text on an iphone?
input_text.Response A: To turn off bold text on an iPhone, go to Settings > General > Accessibility > Bold Text and turn off the switch.
input_text.Response B: Additionally, it would be best to include sources and citations to support your answer.

input_meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.

label_annotations.feedback: response B does not relate to the question
